+353 (1) 6190225     + 44 (0)20 77104156   
mark.cosgrove@gcsltd.com
www.gcsltd.com

Incorporated in 1991, GCS are a specialist recruitment consultancy representing both permanent, contract and interim candidates in Ireland, UK and mainland Europe. 
We supply a range of recruitment services to the IT, Digital Media, Finance & Banking, Accountancy, Engineering and Sales marketplaces.

GCS Recruitment's strength lies in our highly trained and motivated workforce coupled with our ongoing investment in technology. We excel at being able to source even the most hard to find candidates. Our recruitment consultants work hard to become specialists within their particular marketplace. They also ensure that they are fully conversant with their clients' business requirements in order to source the best talent available, quickly and efficiently.

GCS was first awarded the Investors in People (IIP) accreditation in 2001 and has continued to maintain the standard ever since. In order to demonstrate an adherence to quality standards, GCS has ensured that all of its service delivery processes and procedures are accredited to the BS EN ISO 9001:2008 Quality Management Standard.

We are also proud to be rated as an “exceptional” 3 star company by the Best Companies organisation and are also recognised by the Sunday Times as a “Best Company To Work For”

values.headline: Senior Agile Java Developer at Department Of Agriculture and Food
values.summary:
I am a senior agile java engineer with over 13 years experience in the architecture, development and optimisation of enterprise grade applications using the following skills:

•	Core java and j2ee
•	Lightweight open source frameworks (Spring, Hibernate, Ibatis)
•	Enterprise java beans, java server pages, java server faces
•	Web services and service oriented architecture
•	Test-driven development
•	Relational databases and Object Relational Mapping
•	XML
•	Load testing and scalability improvement
•	Configuration and release management

values.headline: Analyst Programmer at Accenture
values.summary:
Specialist development skills with SAP Java frameworks and J2EE Java. I have a sharp eye for detail and quality and have experience of working throughout the software lifecycle. I am a self motivated individual who is both deadlines focused and thorough in my approach to work.Multi-tasking & delivery to deadlines. 

My main responsibilities usually include:

- Reports project status, issues and risks to Management.
- Prioritizes, and manages work activities to meet deadlines assigning tasks and allocating resources.
- “Outside the box” thinker able to identify problems and develop creative solutions.
- Designing, recommending, planning, developing, and implementing project solutions.
- Formulates and recommends technical directions for the SAP Portal and WebDynpro for Java apps.
- Work hand by hand with the SAP Basis team in problems and solutions.
- Requirements: gathering, analyzing, recording, negotiation, specification, validation, management. Blue print and System modelling.

All my experience with SAP is in Java programming, hands-on with SAP JAVA Frameworks.

Experience in analyzing, designing and deploying Java and SAP Netweaver solutions.

8 years experience of commercial software development using JAVA (inside and outside SAP Platform).

values.headline: Java/J2EE Developer - Contractor
values.summary:
I am a professional Java developer with over 8 years of commercial experience.

I have worked hands-on with customers, end users and developers alike. I have extensive experience in full cycle development: gathering requirements, prototyping, defining use cases, evaluating technology, assessing risks, and sizing tasks.

I have designed and developed software ready for production at enterprise level, committed to excellence and industry best practices. I am a quick and independent learner and I really enjoy my work.

values.headline: Freelance J2EE & Android Consultant based in Dublin Ireland
values.summary:
Stephen Downey is a freelance Senior Java Developer/Team Lead with a first class honors M.Sc, specialising in Distributed Systems. He has experience in all aspects of the software development life cycle using various methodologies. The majority of this experience has been designing and developing large scale, Java server side as well as J2EE applications.  He has been working in the software industry in Ireland since 2000.

Stephen is a very focused individual with the ability to prioritize work, take ownership and meet deadlines.   He works equally well as part of a team or independently.  He has a proven record of rapidly learning new concepts and technologies in order to solve critical issues and assist colleagues.  


In 2006, Stephen founded Passion Development, a Software consultancy specialising in Java Development.

values.headline: Software Consultant at Canada Life (Contract runs until March 2012)
values.summary:
I have been working as a software developer for the past ten years in the areas of insurance, telecoms and aircraft. Many of the products that I have worked on have been J2EE web based applications with exposure to all aspects of the development cycle and all technologies from front-end to back end technologies and systems.

Although I have experience working with traditional development methodologies, in recent years I have been working in an agile environment where the Scrum approach has been strongly applied.
